sections.heading: beer; regulation.The manufacture, distribution, sale, and purchase of near beer shall be subject to all provisions of the Nebraska Liquor Control Act, except taxation provisions, to which the manufacture, distribution, sale, and purchase of beer are subject

sections.text:
53-160.02.Near beer; regulation.

The manufacture, distribution, sale, and purchase of near beer shall be subject to all provisions of the Nebraska Liquor Control Act, except taxation provisions, to which the manufacture, distribution, sale, and purchase of beer are subject.

SourceLaws 1989, LB 441, ยง 7;R.S.Supp.,1990, ยง 53-145;Laws 1991, LB 344, ยง 45.
